title: AntKB
author: AntKB
content: Face losing out, by not sending your investment in property and land in the Metaverse Property Game, Upland.me, San Francisco CA, 1 Property+BuildingFirst City was San Francisco CA. Ask for details.My offer is £25,000.00 to co-own. DM me: Responses in 5 hours due to time difference.Negotiation? Yes.

comments.author: DireWolfM14
comments.body: Quote from: AntKB on June 29, 2022, 10:05:19 AMFace losing out, by not sending your investment in property and land in the Metaverse Property Game, Upland.me, San Francisco CA, 1 Property+BuildingFirst City was San Francisco CA. Ask for details.My offer is £25,000.00 to co-own. DM me: Responses in 5 hours due to time difference.Negotiation? Yes.What is this, exactly?  Are you trying to sell partial ownership of a virtual property in Facebooks latest scam?  And what does San Francisco have anything to do with it?  Is virtual property in a virtual rendition of San Francisco?  Is it an authentic rendering, i.e. is it surrounded by homeless street tents and human feces?Maybe if you write a complete sentence with a subject and a predicate someone will DM you after all.
